meanings.definition: Having the most prominent or protruding knuckles.
meanings.sent1: His hands were the knuckliest in the boxing gym.
meanings.sent2: She admired the knuckliest fingers she had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The knuckliest hands in the family always won arm-wrestling contests.
meanings.sent4: The old tree bark felt knuckliest to the touch, like tiny bumps under the skin.
meanings.sent5: The knuckliest branches of the tree reached out like fingers searching for the sun.

meanings.definition: The superlative form of knuckly, relating to knuckles.
meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed his collection of knuckliest rings.
meanings.sent2: The knuckliest on his hand was a family heirloom.
meanings.sent3: The knuckliest on the statue's hand was missing, making it look incomplete.
meanings.sent4: The knuckliest on the brass doorknob was polished to a shine from frequent use.
meanings.sent5: The knuckliest on the stone sculpture stood out, giving it a lifelike appearance.

meanings.definition: The most knuckle-like in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The knuckliest of the rocks had a rough, bumpy surface.
meanings.sent2: She found a seashell that was the knuckliest of all she collected.
meanings.sent3: The knuckliest of the clouds resembled giant cotton balls in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The knuckliest of the bread crusts was the crunchiest to bite into.
meanings.sent5: The knuckliest of the tree roots peeked out of the ground, making it hard to walk.
